name: twitterimagedl
description: This is Chrome Extension.   Download and rename original image in twitter.com.   Add context menu "download original image" when you click right in twitter.com image.   Download original image and rename to "{username}-{tweet id}-{0~3}"   ![gif image](https://raw.github.com/wiki/HassakuTb/TwitterImageDL/images/TwitterImageDL.gif)
author: HassakuTb
